import React, { useEffect, useState} from "react"; import { CourseResponse, InstructorResponse } from "services/courses"; import { selectPlayerCourse } from "state/player/playerSlice"; import { useFetchPlayerCourseQuery } from "services/courses"; import { useAppSelector } from "store/hooks"; import avatarLogo from "static/images/avatar/profile-avatar.png"; type CourseProps = { course: CourseResponse, instructor: InstructorResponse } export const CourseProgress: React.FC = ({ course, instructor }) => { const selectedCourse = useAppSelector(selectPlayerCourse) const { data: courseQuery } = useFetchPlayerCourseQuery(locationPayload.id) const [courseUpdate, setCourse] = useState(); return (
{course.title}

{instructor.first_name ? `${instructor.first_name} ${instructor.last_name}` : instructor.email}

7/23

8. Creating Compelling Characters
); };
